plays.text: Penalty to Sean Burke 2 minutes for Hooking Dan Hinote served by Daniel Briere

Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Interference Shane Doan
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Holding Greg de Vries
Goal scored by Krystofer Kolanos assisted by Brad May and Trevor Letowski
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Sergei Berezin
Penalty to Dan Hinote 2 minutes for Boarding Paul Mara
